abstract: Yahoo announced it would join an alliance that will try to make it easier for programmers to write software that can run on many social networking Web sites.
snippet: Yahoo announced it would join an alliance that will try to make it easier for programmers to write software that can run on many social networking Web sites.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo said Tuesday that it would join an alliance organized by Google, its principal rival, that will try to make it easier for programmers to write software that can run on the pages of many social networks and other Web sites.

headline.main: Yahoo Is Joining an Alliance on Social Networks
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Is Joining an Alliance That Has Google as Leader
